description: This file is a header file (.h) defining function declarations and macros for LZS compression and decompression, including initialization functions. It includes licensing information, version comments, and function prototypes related to compressing and decompressing data using LZS algorithms.

methods.name: LZS_InitHistory
methods.description: Initializes the history buffer for the LZS compression algorithm.

methods.name: LZS_Compress
methods.description: Compresses data from a source handle to a destination handle using LZS compression.

methods.name: LZS_Decompress
methods.description: Decompresses data from a source handle to a destination handle using LZS decompression.
